goals__remit: The food and drink industry wants to play its part as an active partner in addressing these challenges. To ensure that Czech Republic and Europe continues to have the highest quality and safest food in the world. To drive prosperity and ensure quality jobs. Federation's role is to help the industry, policy-makers and civil society work together towards these goals.
